statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'California';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND age < 50 ORDER BY age DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id, social_media_handle FROM customers;
SELECT email, social_media_handle, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, social_media_handle FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Feedback';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE social_media_handle = 'Twitter' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT customer_name AS name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY name HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT post_content, customer_id FROM Posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM Likes GROUP BY customer_id HAVING like_count > 10 ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE join_date <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM Customers JOIN Likes ON Customers.customer_id = Likes.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_likes > 5
SELECT customer_name, post_content FROM Customers JOIN Posts ON Customers.customer_id = Posts.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY post_date ASC

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Posts.post_content, Likes.like_date FROM Customers JOIN Posts ON Customers.customer_id = Posts.customer_id JOIN Likes ON Posts.post_id = Likes.post_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 1 ORDER BY like_date DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, city FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT post_id, content, likes, date_posted FROM posts WHERE likes >= 100 ORDER BY date_posted ASC;
SELECT follower_id, user_id, follower_user_id, date_followed FROM followers WHERE user_id = 3 OR user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_id, content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT users.username, posts.content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;

SELECT followers.date_followed, users.username AS follower_username, follower_user.username AS following_username FROM followers JOIN users ON followers.user_id = users.user_id JOIN users AS follower_user ON followers.follower_user_id = follower_user.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT text, creation_date FROM Posts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS num_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_likes > 5;
SELECT username, text FROM Users JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM Posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 10;
SELECT Users.username, Posts.text FROM Users JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.user_id;
SELECT Comments.text, Users.username FROM Comments JOIN Users ON Comments.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Comments.comment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
